item.description:
This is a dual meetup with The Waltham Beer Meetup Group AND the Red Sox Natives Meetup. Yeehaw! :)

The Sox are taking on the Yanks in the first of a 2-game series in the Bronx... and the Celtics game might be on as well, since it's their last home game of the season. The Mad Raven has a bunch of TV's and as a bonus, a large pull down screen in the middle of the room!

We've got a bunch of locals from the Waltham area coming to meetup, so let's make this a great dual event. Please email me if you have any questions, and looking forward to seeing you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll probably wear a Sox hat! Take a look at my picture - the bar is pretty small, so you should be able to find me there. I can give out my cell number if that will help. :)
item.why: You'll get to watch a game, try a new place, and meet a bunch of new people from a nearby meetup group. How can you go wrong?

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Joint Meetup: Watch the Sox take on the Yanks!
